evidence.claim: Gradient utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing capabilities.
Their platform is fully HIPAA compliant for handling patient data.
Gradient supports FHIR standards for data exchange in health applications.
Integration with EHR systems is facilitated via REST APIs as documented on their development page.
The company uses Azure Functions for event-driven processing in their applications.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 or clearinghouse-related capabilities.
